metadata.description: Captain America's in a race across the world to solve a mystery from World War Two! James "Bucky" Barnes has led many lives. Once he was Captain America's partner Bucky, a proud member of the Invaders, a founder of the original Young Allies. Now he is Captain America, the Sentinel of Liberty, and when an old enemy suddenly reappears, Jim must re-open the last, unsolved case of the Young Allies- to stop a menace that threatens the world!
metadata.name: Captain America: Forever Allies
